q: with Unequal Technologies, a provider of the football pads Michael Vick wore most of this season. ''To sum it all up, the last five months, have been delayed gratification,'' Michael Vick said. Things that I wanted to accomplish the last couple years that I couldn't and I had to wait for it, and I had to be patient, and I did it and it all paid off. I just thank God for putting me with the right group of people, with Andy, with a flagship organization, a great group of coaches.... They give me all the credit, but I give them the credit. Delivering the party's response to the president is an honor but by no means a ticket to stardom. Page ''in my clear opinion, is ready to lead.'' Sergey Brin will continue to focus on technology products, assuming the title of co-founder as opposed to his current role of president, technology. He's an innovator and entrepreneur to the core, and this role suits him perfectly, Eric Schmidt wrote in his post. ''As Google has grown, managing the business has become more complicated. Still, she said Michael Vick 's dogfighting operation probably helped pit bulls' bad rep because it showed that ''people can reintroduce these dogs back into a society that's not going to abuse them.'' The owner is responsible for what an animal does. It's totally your behavior, whether you have a good dog that minds well and is not a problem to society or you turn it into a vicious animal that will bite the mailman, the girl next door or grandma walking down the street, Michael Hansen said. During his time working for me, Andy Coulson has carried out his role with complete professionalism. He has been a brilliant member of my team and has thrown himself at the job with skill and dedication. He can be extremely proud of the role he has played, including for the last eight months in Government. ''I wish Andy Coulson all the very best for his future, which I am certain will be a successful one. on the show and win the grand prize of a$ 5 Million dollar Sony recording contract. Why so young with American Idol, a similar singing competition, starts at the age of 15?' I like the idea that a 12-year-old on this show can compete with an older singer and a singing group, says Simon Cowell . ''I've never believed there should be a cut-off age for talent, and we are going to put our money where our mouths are with the$ 5 million recording contract. I'm doing

the triple-threat up here.' So I think we're going to be good, man.'' ''Look, the show is amazing,'' said Mike Darnell , Fox's president of alternative entertainment. I mean, it's 10 years in. Let's all get perspective on it. It's achieved the virtual impossibility of being, six years in a row, the No. 1 show... that's bigger than M* A* S* H. That's bigger than All in the Family. ''This new panel is terrific, and I think the audience, if it keeps coming at these levels- considering DVR use and everywhere that television's been- we'll be thrilled. Simon Cowell said: searing sentiments Will American Idol miss Simon Cowell ? Probably, especially when it's time to disinvite tone-deaf hopefuls from the competition.
